bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Recently Estonian authorities asked eeste-id users to update ID card certificates. So I opened qdigidoc, and as you can see in screenshot [1], the applications says that the certificate needs to be updated. So I click on "Update" button but the application, instead of updating the certificate, it simply opens ID-card utility as shown in screenshot [2]
Upstream bugreport https://github.com/open-eid/qdigidoc/issues/46
Version 3.12.2
[1]: https://germano.fedorapeople.org/canc/eeste-id/1.jpeg [2]: https://germano.fedorapeople.org/canc/eeste-id/2.jpeg

This might be due to fact that koji does not support networking while building, so I have to hack my way through :)
https://github.com/open-eid/qdigidoc/wiki/DeveloperTips
I will prepare an updated build with latest upstream release and with files, that are needed for certificate update. Hopefully this will resolv this issue for a while.
